item.title: Algorithms Killed Taste. Lulu and Georgia Has a Plan to Bring It Back
item.description: Algorithms and AI have led to an era of boring sameness in interior design. But a resistance is emerging.

item.title: There Are Only So Many Minutes in a Day. Here’s How to Not Waste Time on Pointless Meetings
item.description: The answer isn’t to completely eliminate meetings, but to prioritize better ones.

item.title: Emma Grede Shares 4 Crucial Storytelling Elements for a Compelling Pitch
item.description: Successful entrepreneurs aren’t just the ones with the best ideas. They’re the ones who tell the most compelling stories.

item.title: A Founder Shares Why a Loss of 70 Percent of His Company’s Revenue Didn’t Break It. Instead, It Helped His Team Rebuild
item.description: You can’t outgrow inefficiency, but solving for it can be more profitable than growth.

item.title: Choose the Human Path for AI
item.description: To realize the greatest gains from artificial intelligence, we must make the future of work more human, not less.
